title: Bug 124620: Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in the library is deleted
OB: After deleting a parameter in the library, if you reopen the report design file, the parameter icon in the report remains unchanged. However, if the same operation is performed on a dataset, the dataset icon in the report becomes invalid.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report scalar parameter.
2. Create a report using the library mentioned above.
3. In the library explorer, pull the parameter into the data explorer view of the report.
4. Open the library file and delete the parameter.
5. Reopen the report design file and observe that the parameter icon remains unchanged.
